name: uts_sem5-workspace
description: Workspace runner to start all services together

scripts.dev: concurrently -n "BACKEND,FRONTEND,WEBSOCKET,AI" -c "blue,green,yellow,magenta" "npm run dev:backend" "npm run dev:frontend" "npm run dev:websocket" "npm run dev:ai"
scripts.dev:no-ai: concurrently -n "BACKEND,FRONTEND,WEBSOCKET" -c "blue,green,yellow" "npm run dev:backend" "npm run dev:frontend" "npm run dev:websocket"
scripts.install-all: npm install && cd backend && composer install && cd ../frontend && npm install && cd ../grpc-service && npm install
